services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From start to finish, we handle your administrative needs

step1.title: Initial Assessment
step1.description: We analyze your current administrative processes and identify areas for improvement.

step2.title: Email Management
step2.description: We organize, filter, and respond to emails according to your preferences.

step3.title: Calendar Management
step3.description: We schedule meetings, set reminders, and ensure you never miss an important appointment.

step4.title: Document Handling
step4.description: We create, edit, and organize documents to keep your business running smoothly.

step5.title: Travel Arrangements
step5.description: We book flights, hotels, and transportation for your business trips.

step6.title: Client Communication
step6.description: We maintain professional communication with your clients on your behalf.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated professionals ready to assist you

member1.name: Emily Johnson
member1.bio: With over 10 years of experience, Emily specializes in executive assistance and document management.

member2.name: David Smith
member2.bio: David ensures your schedule is optimized and you never miss an important meeting.
member2.funFact: David once organized a conference for 500 people in just 3 days!

member3.name: Sarah Williams
member3.bio: Sarah transforms chaotic inboxes into organized communication systems.
member3.funFact: Sarah can type 120 words per minute!

member4.name: Michael Brown
member4.bio: Michael creates and manages professional documents with meticulous attention to detail.
member4.funFact: Michael has a background in graphic design!
